mapper.insert:
insert into data_mybatis_1 (user_id, sample1, sample2, sample3, sample4, sample5 , sample6, sample7, sample8, sample9, sample10, sample11, sample12, sample13, sample14 , sample15, sample16, sample17, sample18, sample19, sample20, sample21, sample22, sample23, sample24) VALUES
( "${item.userId}", "${item.sample1}", "${item.sample2}", "${item.sample3}", "${item.sample4}", "${item.sample5}", "${item.sample6}", "${item.sample7}", "${item.sample8}", "${item.sample9}", "${item.sample10}", "${item.sample11}", "${item.sample12}", "${item.sample13}", "${item.sample14}", "${item.sample15}", "${item.sample16}", "${item.sample17}", "${item.sample18}", "${item.sample19}", "${item.sample20}", "${item.sample21}", "${item.sample22}", "${item.sample23}", "${item.sample24}" )
